title: Ensure Water Rights Compliance
description: A farmer in a regulated water basin needs to track their water usage to ensure they do not exceed their annual allocation.

tasks.description: Retrieve the farm's annual water allocation from the regional water board database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the farm has an allocation of 500 acre-feet.

tasks.description: Retrieve the cumulative water usage for the farm for the current year from flow meters.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the farm has used 450 acre-feet to date.

tasks.description: Calculate the remaining water allocation and send a notification to the farmer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent notifies the farmer that they have 50 acre-feet of water remaining for the year.
